verbs.description: [ARGM-ADV: In response to a question about a deal with North Korea] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: veered] [ARG1: to Iran] , [ARGM-PRD: saying he 'd like to make a nuclear deal with them , too] .
In response to a question about a deal with North Korea , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] veered to Iran , [V: saying] [ARG1: he 'd like to make a nuclear deal with them , too] .
In response to a question about a deal with North Korea , President Donald Trump veered to Iran , saying he [V: 'd] like to make a nuclear deal with them , too .

In response to a question about a deal with North Korea , President Donald Trump veered to Iran , saying [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: 'd] [V: like] [ARG1: to make a nuclear deal with them] , [ARGM-DIS: too] .
In response to a question about a deal with North Korea , President Donald Trump veered to Iran , saying [ARG0: he] 'd like to [V: make] [ARG1: a nuclear deal with them] , too .
